desc.1: Unleashes up to 3 strikes, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

BasicAttackDoAsIPlease.name: Basic Attack: Do As I Please
BasicAttackDoAsIPlease.desc: After using a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, Nicole can reload, and her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct> are enhanced, increasing the power of her bullets.

desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: Drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to dodge, then hold <IconEvade /> to reload while dodging, enhancing <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</ct> up to 8 times.

DashAttackJackInTheBox.name: Dash Attack: Jack in the Box

desc.0: When dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during a dodge, press <IconNormal />:
desc.1: Dashes in the target direction and strikes nearby enemies, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: When not dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during a dodge, press <IconNormal />:
desc.3: Vaults backward and launches a ranged strike against enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.4: Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, up to 8 times.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Dodge backwards and send a ranged strike at enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct> up to 8 times.

desc.1: Unleashes a ranged strike against enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
desc.3: Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct> up to 8 times.

EXSpecialAttackStuffedSugarcoatedBullet.name: EX Special Attack: Stuffed Sugarcoated Bullet

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: A powerful ranged strike, generating an energy field that pulls enemies towards its center to deal <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Hold <IconSpecialReady /> down to charge up this attack, during which a small energy field is generated at the muzzle as Energy is consumed, dealing bonus DMG to enemies nearby.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.4: A <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
desc.5: Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct> up to 8 times.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes a powerful ranged strike at enemies in a small area, generating an energy field that pulls enemies towards its center to deal <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: A <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
desc.4: Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct> up to 8 times.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes a powerful ranged strike at enemies in a small area, generating an energy field that pulls enemies towards its center to deal <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct>.
desc.2: When using this skill, other squad members recover 10 Energy. The next character to switch in gains an additional 20 Energy.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.4: A <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
desc.5: Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct> up to 8 times.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Dodge backwards and send a ranged strike at enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct> up to 8 times.

DefensiveAssistTheHareStrikesBack.name: Defensive Assist: The Hare Strikes Back!

desc.0: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Charge forward and bombard enemies, dealing <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core.name: Core Passive: Mechanical Case
desc: After hitting an enemy with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, Nicole can reload, enhancing her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>. When her enhanced bullets or Energy Field hits an enemy, the target's DEF is reduced by <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct> for 3.5s.

After hitting an enemy with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, Nicole can reload, enhancing her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>. When her enhanced bullets or Energy Field hits an enemy, the target's DEF is reduced by <ct color=#2BAD00>25%</ct> for 3.5s.

After hitting an enemy with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, Nicole can reload, enhancing her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>. When her enhanced bullets or Energy Field hits an enemy, the target's DEF is reduced by <ct color=#2BAD00>30%</ct> for 3.5s.

After hitting an enemy with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, Nicole can reload, enhancing her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>. When her enhanced bullets or Energy Field hits an enemy, the target's DEF is reduced by <ct color=#2BAD00>34%</ct> for 3.5s.

After hitting an enemy with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, Nicole can reload, enhancing her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>. When her enhanced bullets or Energy Field hits an enemy, the target's DEF is reduced by <ct color=#2BAD00>36%</ct> for 3.5s.

After hitting an enemy with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, Nicole can reload, enhancing her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>. When her enhanced bullets or Energy Field hits an enemy, the target's DEF is reduced by <ct color=#2BAD00>38%</ct> for 3.5s.

After hitting an enemy with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, Nicole can reload, enhancing her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>. When her enhanced bullets or Energy Field hits an enemy, the target's DEF is reduced by <ct color=#2BAD00>40%</ct> for 3.5s.

ability.name: Additional Ability: Hare of Many Burrows

desc.0: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
desc.1: When Nicole's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Mechanical Case</ct> applies a debuff to an enemy, all units deal 25% more <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct> to the target for 3.5s.

1.name: Supercharged Bomb
1.desc: The DMG and the Anomaly Buildup inflicted by Nicole's <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> increases by 16%. For each additional 0.1s of charging when Nicole activates her <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the duration of the energy field created at the target location increases by 0.15s

flavor.0: "I've juiced you all up! Go get 'em!"
flavor.1: "Huh? I-I wasn't slacking off, I swear — I just needed a break!"

2.name: Charging Device
2.desc: Nicole recovers 5 Energy when <ct color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Mechanical Case's</ct> debuff is triggered. This effect can trigger once every 15s.

flavor.0: "Never underestimate the value of a single second!"
flavor.1: "Do you have any idea how much extra I can squeeze out of just one second? It's unfathomable!"
flavor.2: "So, can I get a productivity bonus? How about 10%, huh?"

3.name: A Hare's Cunning
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
3.flavor: Without overpowering might or abundant resources, Nicole depended on her own sharp mind to bring the Cunning Hares to where they are today.

4.name: Field Expansion
4.desc: When Nicole uses her <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, the diameter of the energy field generated at the target location is increased by 3m.

flavor.0: "This, and this too — all of this will soon become the Cunning Hares' territory. Do you hear me!"
flavor.2: "Uh... in about ten thousand years, based on current revenue projections."

5.name: Industry Star
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
5.flavor: Though they have plenty of enemies in the industry, Nicole has led her team out of many impossible situations, and so their reputation and experience steadily grew.

6.name: Corrupting Energy Field
6.desc: When Nicole's energy fields deal DMG to an enemy, all units' CRIT Rate against that enemy increases by 1.5%, stacking up to 10 times, and lasting 12s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
6.flavor: A switch to higher quality ammo with better firepower and increased compressed Etheric Matter leads to higher damage, longer use duration... and higher costs.
